Posts.EditableText: I am having trouble creating two line breaks in a row? I read up on Markdown line breaks but nothing seems to work. What I want to do is the following. Paragraph Normal blank line - working fine Paragraph Normal blank line - working fine Extra blank Line - not working Paragraph Is there a trick that I am missing?
Posts.HTML:
I am having trouble creating two line breaks in a row? I read up on Markdown line breaks but nothing seems to work.

What I want to do is the following.

Paragraph
Normal blank line - working fine
Paragraph
Normal blank line - working fine
Extra blank Line - not working
Paragraph

Is there a trick that I am missing?

Posts.EditableText: I expect Markdown collapses multiple line breaks into one, so if you want to force an extra one, just use a <br/> tag.
Posts.HTML: I expect Markdown collapses multiple line breaks into one, so if you want to force an extra one, just use a <br/> tag.

Posts.EditableText: Hmmm, interestingly if I use one <br/> it removes ALL.  If I use two, I get a single line break and if I use three I get what I wanted which is a double line break.  OK by me but is that working as intended?
Posts.HTML: Hmmm, interestingly if I use one <br/> it removes ALL.  If I use two, I get a single line break and if I use three I get what I wanted which is a double line break.  OK by me but is that working as intended?

Posts.EditableText: It probably interprets the block as HTML in that case, so I gueeessss it makes some kind of sense...
Posts.HTML: It probably interprets the block as HTML in that case, so I gueeessss it makes some kind of sense...
